name: typescript-fullstack-template
description: A TypeScript monorepo template for fullstack applications with React, Express, and shared types

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace api dev" "yarn workspace ui dev"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @your-app/shared build && yarn workspace api build && yarn workspace ui build
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace api start" "yarn workspace ui start"
scripts.clean:all: rimraf packages/*/dist packages/*/node_modules node_modules yarn.lock || echo 'Clean completed (some paths may not have existed)'
scripts.reset: yarn clean:all && yarn install && yarn workspace @your-app/shared build
scripts.check-types: yarn tsc --noEmit -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json && yarn tsc --noEmit -p packages/api/tsconfig.json && yarn tsc --noEmit -p packages/ui/tsconfig.json
